text_blocks.content: TELEPHONED PLEASE CALL CAME TO SEE YOU WILL CALL AGAIN WANTS TO SEE YOU RUSH RETURNED YOUR CALL SPECIAL ATTENTION
FOR SARAH DATE 7/17/04 TIME 8:02 A.M. M OF GEORGE
"I AM JET-LAG AND NODDING OFF. JUST SAY I CALLED HER."
FOR MR EPSTEIN DATE 7/17/04 TIME 6:55 A.M. M DOJ REDACTION OF PHONE/ MOBILE (561) 201
'ME & CAN COME TOMORROW ANY TIME OR ALONE
FOR SARAH OR MR EPSTEIN DATE 07/17/04 TIME 6:45 A.M. M DOJ REDACTION OF PHONE/ MOBILE (561) 964
"WAS IN A CAR ACCIDENT ON HER WAY SO CAN NOT COME. SHE JUST GOT BACK."

additional_notes: The document appears to be a set of four 'Important Message' slips, likely from a legal or government context. The slips contain handwritten notes and messages, some of which have been redacted by the Department of Justice (DOJ). The document is stamped as a 'GOVERNMENT EXHIBIT 3-M-R' with a reference number.
